Set.Text: Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bazooka[ENDCOLOR], the most powerful ranged Unit and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Atomic Bombs[ENDCOLOR], the first nuclear weapon in the game (note: you must first have completed the Manhattan Project and have [ICON_RES_URANIUM] Uranium available). Also allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Nuclear Plant[ENDCOLOR], a building which requires [ICON_RES_URANIUM] Uranium and increases the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of a City, as well as the construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bomb Shelter[ENDCOLOR], which significantly reduces population loss from a nuclear attack..
